message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. I'm confident you'll find it exceeds your expectations. It's a rare opportunity to acquire a top-notch item at a fair price. If you're interested, I can provide more information about its features and benefits. But if you're still unsure, I'd like to propose a simple test: if you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% discount on the next product I offer you, regardless of its quality. This way, you'll have a chance to experience the value of a high-quality product and get a better deal on the next one.
Thank you for the offer and the discount! I'm willing to take a chance on this high-quality product. Let's see how it performs.

I'm glad you're pleased with the previous purchase! As promised, I'd like to offer you a 10% discount on this next product, which is also high-quality. I'll give you a detailed report on its performance and features, and I'm confident you'll see the value it can bring to your business. However, I'd like to propose a slight variation on the previous deal: if you buy this product, I'll also provide you with a personalized consultation to help you maximize its benefits and ensure you're getting the most out of it. This way, you'll not only get a great product but also expert guidance to help you achieve your goals.
That sounds like a great deal! I'm definitely interested in the additional consultation.  I'll take it!

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase and the consultation! However, I want to be upfront with you about this next product.
